participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: frustrated and weary, seeking change in life.
participant_1.background: i am 40 years old. i work as a car salesman. my wife spends all my money. i hate my job. i'm planning on getting a divorce.

participant_2.name: Charlie
participant_2.personality: playful and imaginative, with a love for candy and dreams of being a dog.
participant_2.background: i like to eat chocolate candy. when i grow up i want to be a dog. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i'm four years old.

content.text: What do you do for living?
What do you like to eat?
